amendment.description: Page 8, line 20, insert "or section 733(c) of this title" after "title 5".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 115-39 to include as prohibited personnel practices as described in the whistleblower protection subsection of section 3 with those defined in 38 USC 733(c).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Kuster (NH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
